Native Sensitive Facial Cleanser, Aloe & Vitamin B3

Brand: Native

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water, Sodium Chloride, Niacinamide, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 0787-Native Sensitive Facial Cleanser, Aloe & Vitamin B3
